DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study refine , evaluate feasibility , estimate effect `` healthy Living Study , '' brief outpatient problem-solving intervention promote healthy eating activity habit adolescent .
DOC.brief_title: A Brief Outpatient Problem-solving Intervention Promote Healthy Eating Activity Habits Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: This study refine , evaluate feasibility , estimate effect brief problem-solving intervention promote healthy eating activity habit adolescent . Intervention participant receive 2 session individual behavioral counsel problem-solving skill utilize educational video , handout , worksheet . Intervention participant ask generate unique health goal practice utilize problem-solving skill achieve goals.Control participant receive standard care . Outcomes explore ability shorten intervention , integrate intervention busy outpatient clinic , estimate effect intervention confidence maintain improve healthy habit improve problem-solving skill .
DOC.criteria: 1318 year old Able read speak English Patient Lucile Packard Children 's Hospital teen clinic , weight clinic , mobile teen van History purging within prior 12 month
